required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Water-only Fasting in the Treatment of Hypertension Patients
clinical_study.official_title: A Safety and Feasibility Study of Water-only Fasting and Refeeding for Treatment of Stage 1 and 2 Hypertensive Patients

brief_summary.textblock: This purpose of this study is to examine the safety and feasibility of water-only fasting to treat hypertensive patients.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a prospective, open label, single arm, intervention study to examine the safety and feasibility of water-only fasting to treat hypertensive patients. Additional aims include describing mean changes in resting blood pressure as well as markers of cardiovascular health and inflammation between baseline and end of fast, end of refeed, and 6-weeks post departure.

primary_outcome.measure: Determine number of treatment-associated of grade 1-4 adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events will be identified through participant interviews and medical record review

secondary_outcome.measure: Examine the feasibility of using fasting and refeeding in the treatment of stage 1 and 2 hypertension based on change in systolic blood pressure (SBP)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 10 to 40 days after baseline, up to 5 to 20 days after end of fast, 6-weeks after departure
secondary_outcome.description: SBP will be measured using digital blood pressure device and reported in mmHg

secondary_outcome.measure: Examine the feasibility of using fasting and refeeding in the treatment of stage 1 and 2 hypertension based on treatment acceptability
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 7-40 days after baseline and 6-weeks after end of refeed
secondary_outcome.description: Treatment acceptability will be assessed using the validated Treatment Adherence/Acceptability Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Examine the feasibility of using fasting and refeeding in the treatment of stage 1 and 2 hypertension based on food acceptability
secondary_outcome.description: Food acceptability will be assed using the validated Food Acceptability Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Examine the feasibility of using fasting and refeeding in the treatment of stage 1 and 2 hypertension based on dietary adhernece
secondary_outcome.description: Dietary adherence rates will be assessed using the SOS-free Dietary Screener

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in resting blood pressure from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in SBP and diastolic blood pressure will be measured using a digital blood pressure device and reported as mmHg

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in lipid profile from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in lipid profile will be assessed using serum to measure cholesterol, triglycerides, high-density lipoprotein (HDL), and low-density lipoprotein (LDL) and reported in mg/dL

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in fasting glucose and apolipoprotein B from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in fasting glucose and apolipoprotein B will be assessed using serum and reported as mg/dL

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in body mass index (BMI) from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in BMI will be assessed by measuring weight in kilograms (kg) and height in meters (m) and reported as kg/m2

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in insulin from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in insulin will be assessed by using serum and reported as uIU/ml

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in visceral adipose tissue from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in visceral adipose tissue will be assessed using dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry and presented as grams

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in high sensitivity C-reactive protein (hsCRP) from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in hsCRP will be assessed using serum and reported as mg/L

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in gamma-glutamyl-transferase (GGT) from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in GGT will be assessed using serum and reported as U/L

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in lipoprotein associated phospholipase A2 from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in lipoprotein associated phospholipase A2 will be assessed using serum and reported as nmol/min/mL

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in homocysteine from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in homocysteine will be assessed using serum and reported as umol/L

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in aldosterone from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in aldosterone will be assessed using serum and 24 hour urine and reported as ng/dL

other_outcome.measure: Describe mean changes in abdominal circumference from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Abdominal circumference will be measured at minimal waist and reported in centimeters

other_outcome.measure: Describe changes in renin activity from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in renin activity will be assessed using serum and reported as ng/mL/hr

other_outcome.measure: Describe changes in sodium from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in sodium will be assessed using 24 hour urine and reported as mmol/24 hr

other_outcome.measure: Describe changes in creatinine and total protein from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in sodium will be assessed using 24 hour urine and reported as mg/dL

other_outcome.measure: Describe changes in potassium from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in potassium will be assessed using 24 hour urine and reported as mmol/L

other_outcome.measure: Describe changes in albumin from baseline
other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in albumin will be assessed using 24 hour urine and reported as ug/mL

other_outcome.time_frame: Baseline, up to 7-40 days after baseline, up to 3 to 20 days after end-of-fast, 6-weeks after end of refeed
other_outcome.description: Changes in 3-methyl-histidine will be assessed using 24 hour urine and reported as umol/day

arm_group.description: Participants who voluntarily elect and are approved to water-only fast.

intervention.description: Participants consume only water for at least 7 days in an in-patient, residential setting with 24 hour medical supervision.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Any gender
2. 30-75 years old
3. Diagnosis of Stage 1 or 2 hypertension
4. Fasting plasma glucose <126mg/dL and/or hemoglobin A1c <7 percent
5. Elect and qualify for a water-only fast of at least 7 consecutive days
6. Provide informed consent
7. Internet and computer access
8. Able to go to LabCorp for 6-week follow-up visit
9. Willing/able to collect 24-hour urine sample prior to water-only fasting
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Systolic Blood Pressure/Diastolic Blood Pressure >180/120 mmHg
2. Active malignancy
3. Active kidney disease (creatinine over 2.0)
4. Active inflammatory disorder including classic autoimmune connective tissue (Lupus, Sjogrens, ANCA), multiple sclerosis, and inflammatory bowel disorders (Ulcerative colitis, Crohn's)
5. Stroke, heart attack, deep vein thrombosis, atrial fibrillation, anticoagulant therapy, or pulmonary embolism within the last 12 months
6. Inability to discontinue medications or supplements
7. Abdominal metal implants
8. Inability to consume only plant food for at least 48 hours before fast begins.
9. Unable to lay still on the back for at least 10 min.

patient_data.ipd_description: After publication, the IPD will be available by contacting the corresponding author.
